articles.title: So goodbye America – Elton John bids the US a rhapsodic farewell - The Telegraph
articles.description: Unfussily live-streamed on Disney+, this euphoric evening in LA saw Elton perform in the States for what he claims will be the last time
articles.content: It wasnt by coincidence that Elton was staging his big US farewell at Dodger Stadium. This was the backdrop to his iconic double-whammy of gigs in 1975, as immortalised by Terry ONeills photographs. … [+2738 chars]
